title: Tropical View Availability
body: For those wishing to arrive at the resort prior to 10/9/25 and reserve a room under the 'Tropical View' category, we are working with our travel partners now to ensure availabililty of this room category for a wider range of dates! As of now, there are ocean view rooms available to book with an earilest arrival date of October 7th. We will provide an update here when the additional tropical view rooms are available to book through our booking portal.

title: Room Booking and Availability
body: Our RSVP date is approaching! Please be sure to reserve your lodging and RSVP prior to April 25th. For those wishing to arrive at the resort prior to 10/9/25 and reserve a room under the 'Tropical View' category, these rooms should now be available to book through our booking portal.
